main event: An observer reported seeing a luminous disc-shaped object hovering about 50 feet above the ground in Roseville, Michigan on March 15, 1967.
interesting points: The object was illuminated brightly, comparable to a large spotlight and was about 30 feet in diameter., It hovered motionless for about 2 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing from view., The observer reported hearing a spinning or whirling sound during the sighting., The brightness of the object was notably greater than that of the brightest stars., The observer mentioned having experience with various aircraft and believed it was not a conventional aircraft.
